title: PH60412: Introduction To Oceans - Quick Facts
text:
PH60412
Course name | Introduction To Oceans
Offered by | Physics
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Overview of the Oceans, Properties of sea water- Surface Temperature, Salinity and Density, Ocean Head Budget- Direct and indirect calculation of fluxes, Ocean Dynamics- Equations of Motion, Response of Upper Ocean to Wind Stress, Ekman Transport, Ocean Circulation- Wind Driven circulation, Sverdrup Theory, Deep circulation in the world ocean, Ocean Waves- Linear Wave Theory, Ocean Wave Spectrum, Tides, Coastal Processes- Storm Surges, Tsunamies, Ocean Atmospheric Interaction- El Nino Southern Oscillation.
